Subject: Kevin Bacon of Love
Description: For polyamorous folks and those who may be poly-curious, we'd like to offer you an inside look on our lifestyle. Polyamory is the philosophy or state of being in love or romantically involved with more than one person at the same time. Regardless of whether you've been poly for years or have never heard of the term, join us to discuss ethics and styles of poly and 'poly-cules'!  Speakers include:Victoria Stapels, Sunny Smith, Michael McAtee, Chris Thom, Amy Leikert - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
